title.rendered: AVS – Your one-stop solution for Heavy Duty Vehicles and Equipment

content.rendered:
A well-renowned name in the country for offering a wide range of products from specialized footwear to heavy duty vehicles and equipment is AVS International Pvt. Ltd. Also, being one of the heavy truck exporters in India, it is emerging as a global player.

One of their achievements includes delivering 104 fire trucks to Ghana. The heavy-duty machines made by AVS are supplied to the most trusted company of the country “BEML”. Apart from this, AVS is also one of the leading suppliers of heavy-duty trucks to the Indian army. They have all the necessary heavy-duty equipment for construction, transportation, agriculture, defence, mining, and logistics.

BEML and AVS association-

AVS International Pvt. Ltd. is a renowned name in the industry for manufacturing and supplying heavy-duty vehicles. The company is directly associated with an Indian public sector undertaking called “BEML”, which in itself is an established organization in the country.

It manufactures a wide range of earthmoving equipment for mining, construction, transportation, irrigation, and power. AVS International is a trusted supplier of heavy duty vehicles and equipment to BEML and this association has benefitted both the companies in increasing their brand value. A heavy-duty truck that has made AVS stand out from other manufacturers in the country is “Tatra truck”, used by the defence services.

AVS’ Tatra Truck speciality-

It is a terrain vehicle with high mobility used for GS  roles in the Indian Army. Additionally, it transports army personnel and can carry payloads of about 10,500 kgs. It has a tyre inflation system that enables the inflation/deflation of tyres depending on the condition of the terrain.

Types of heavy duty vehicles and equipment

Apart from the Tatra truck, AVS also offers heavy-duty trucks used for other purposes. Let’s dive deep into the different types of heavy-duty trucks available in India-

A heavy-duty truck is majorly used for long haul transportation and weighs around 26,001 pounds. Some examples include- road roller, excavator, mobile cranes, and dump truck.

Also referred to as a heavy-duty machine, this heavy-duty truck is designed to perform construction tasks mainly earthwork operations. It comprises 5 equipment systems: implementation, traction, structure, power train, information, and control. They are divided into three categories based on their weight-

  1. Class 7- 26001 to 33000 pounds
  2. Class 8- 33001 or heavier
  3. Class 9- Vehicles exceeding 60,000 pounds

●    Mining and Construction

1.   Dump Truck

A dump truck is used for taking dumps of sand or demolition wastes for construction purposes. It is also known as a tipper truck or tip-trailer that contains hydraulic rams to uplift the front portion of the open bed box of the truck.

2.   Excavator

These are also known as diggers and are used for digging trenches, construction, mining, forestry work, and demolition. It consists of a boom, dipper, bucket, and a cab that rotates on a platform. An excavator makes the use of hydraulic motors, cylinders, and fluid for performing multiple operations.

3.   Loader

A heavy-duty truck that moves or loads the construction materials from one place and transfers onto a dump truck or another machinery like a conveyor belt.

The materials can be dirt, snow, logs, gravel, asphalt, sand, rock, or raw minerals. It has a bucket at the front side connected on the ends of two booms, which serves as a scoop to load the material to be transferred.

4.   Crane

Crane is also a heavy-duty truck, used in transportation for loading and unloading of materials, in construction for moving of materials from one place to another and in manufacturing for assembling of heavy machines. It consists of sheaves and wire ropes used for lifting and moving of materials.

Wheel dozers, Pipe layers, Motor Graders, Tyre Handlers, and Water Sprinklers are some of the other trucks provided by the heavy truck exporters in India.

●    Defence Services

1.   Crash Fire Tender

It is a type of heavy-duty truck specially designed for aircraft rescue and fire fighting at military airbases. They consist of high capacity pumps and water cannons, which helps to deal with fire over long distances.

2.   Heavy Recovery Vehicle

These are used to recover stalled, buried, or overturned vehicles of the defence forces. Heavy recovery vehicles are capable of working in different terrains including desert, rocky and marshy grounds as well as hilly areas.

Rocket launcher, Pontoon trucks, trailers, missile launchers, and Tatra trucks are some other majorly used heavy-duty vehicles in the defence sector.

Heavy Truck Exporters in India

Owing to the presence of manufacturers like Tata Motors, Ashok Leyland, Daimler group, Oshkosh Corporation, Ford Motor Company, Volvo, and Volkswagen, the heavy-duty vehicle’s global market is highly competitive.

Talking about the heavy truck exporters in India, it ranges from small private companies to large scale organizations. Electrome chemical and fluid power industries private limited, Syndicate Overseas, AVS International Pvt. Ltd., and Godavari Sons are some of the famous heavy truck exporters in India. Their heavy-duty vehicles are specially designed for logistics, mining, construction, and agricultural purposes.

It is also estimated that this industry will register a CAGR of 4.5% during 2020-2025, which is good news for the exporters. Let’s take a look at the factors driving the growth of the heavy-duty truck market:

  • With a penetration towards smart phones, people are now relying more on online ordering. For this purpose, e-commerce companies are purchasing more heavy-duty trucks for exporting and importing products from different regions.
  • Developing countries have a pipeline of construction projects which is raising the demand for heavy-duty trucks and equipment. Majorly, the APAC region is emerging as a major market for the heavy-duty machines.
  • The agriculture sector will witness a growth in demand for heavy-duty machines that offer high traction, lower emission, and fuel-efficient engines.
  • The mining industry is expected to boost the sales of heavy-duty vehicles as it has risen after 2015 creating a lot of profit.

AVS- your one-stop solution for heavy-duty vehicles

Rapid industrialization and growing domestic, as well as international trade activities, is positively influencing the heavy-duty vehicles market share. Also, the presence of numerous truck service providers trying to expand their truck fleet is constantly coming up with innovative ideas.

The heavy truck exporters in India are trying to improve the overall efficiency of heavy trucks by developing new power train technologies. AVS International Pvt. Ltd. is also trying its best to serve its customers with more technologically advanced heavy-duty machines.

The company with its vast range of heavy-duty equipment never compromises with the quality of the products and always keeps the client’s needs on priority. AVS is undoubtedly the one-stop solution if you are looking for a trustworthy and reliable option to purchase heavy-duty machines.
